name: BESTIE PICKS BAE(LF)
description:
On July 27th, 2019, one of my favorite people on Earth introduced me to Bestie Picks Bae, an addictingly terrible online teen dating show.

I immediately made a note to recreate it with my OCs.

This is it.

FEATURES

  • Short routes (5-10 minutes) - but dynamically changing character interactions depending on who you eliminate, so if you want to be a completionist,  you can spend a few hours finding all the interactions!
  • A diverse and inclusive cast of characters!
  • All-original art and writing!
  • The finest royalty-free BGM YouTube had to offer!
  • Five CGs to unlock!
  • The ability to name your character!

DISCLAIMER

At certain points, this game contains mild swearing and vaguely implied sexual themes. It's not NSFW at all, but if these topics make you uncomfortable for one reason or another, you might want to wait until other routes have been released.

This is a non-profit project please don't sue me
